/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of depth and scale to the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with fluffy white clouds. The street itself is lined with lush green trees and bushes, adding a touch of nature to the urban landscape. On the right side of the street, buildings rise, their facades bathed in sunlight. A white van is parked on the left side of the street, adding a touch of everyday life to the scene. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the trees and bushes contrasting beautifully with the blue sky and the white buildings. The image is a beautiful representation of a day in the life of this bustling city.
